Draw a vertical line (line\\_1) from point 0.0, 0.0 to point 0.0, 0.375. 2. Draw a vertical line (line\\_2) from point 0.0, 0.375 to point 0.0, 0.75. 3. Draw a line (line\\_3) from point 0.0, 0.75 to point 0.0352, 0.7148. 4. Draw a line (line\\_4) from point 0.0352, 0.7148 to point 0.0352, 0.0352. 5. Draw a line (line\\_5) from point 0.0352, 0.0352 to point 0.0, 0.0. Close the loop to complete the prism base. Scale the Sketch Apply a scaling factor of 0.75 to the 2D sketch. Transform the Sketch into 3D Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch using the coordinate system parameters: * Extrude the prism base by 0.1641 units in the positive Z-direction (towards the normal). Do not extrude in the opposite direction. * The sketch scale remains at 0.75. Complete the Operation Combine the current part with the previous CAD model using a join operation to add material. Describe the Part Document the part as follows: * Shape: A rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. The length of the prism is twice the width, and the height is half the width. The prism is centered on a white background. * Length: 0.1641 * Width: 0.75 * Height: 0.75</description>
